message:
SYSTEM: Wiki: Semantic web

Articles written by TBL in 1996 (
http://www.w3.org/People/Berners-Lee/1996/ppf.html
) and 2001 (
http://www.scientificamerican.com/article.cfm?id=the-semantic-web
). The last one has now been made available under a paywall, but it seems to be available at
https://www-sop.inria.fr/acacia/cours/essi2006/Scientific%20American_%20Feature%20Article_%20The%20Semantic%20Web_%20May%202001.pdf
TED 2009 talk by TBL (
http://www.ted.com/talks/tim_berners_lee_on_the_next_web.html
)
Semantic Web and Linked Data design issues technical reports (
http://www.w3.org/DesignIssues/Semantic.html
,
http://www.w3.org/DesignIssues/LinkedData.html
)
Linked Data Vision paper from Bizer et al., 2009 (
http://tomheath.com/papers/bizer-heath-berners-lee-ijswis-linked-data.pdf
)
MetaWeb video (
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TJfrNo3Z-DU
)
RDF:
https://www.w3.org/TR/rdf-primer/
RDF(S):
https://www.w3.org/TR/rdf-schema/
OWL:
https://www.w3.org/TR/owl-ref/
SPARQL:
https://www.w3.org/TR/sparql11-query/
speaker: SYSTEM
